description: Try our easy to follow Insalata Di Ceci E Tonno (Chickpea & Tuna Salad) recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Insalata Di Ceci E Tonno (Chickpea & Tuna Salad) Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can no added salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained
185g can tuna in springwater, drained, flaked

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange rocket mix, chickpeas, tomato, olive, onion, tuna and parsley in bowls.
Whisk oil, lemon juice and mustard together. Pour over salad. Season.
